XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local/onenote plugin

TABLE.NAME: onenote_user_sections
TABLE.COMMENT: to store OneNote section id's for each user for each course

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Course id of the enrolled course

FIELD.NAME: section_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Section id of the Onenote section

TABLE.NAME: onenote_assign_pages
TABLE.COMMENT: to store OneNote page id's for submissions and fedbacks for student's assignments

FIELD.NAME: submission_student_page_id
FIELD.COMMENT: OneNote page id for stodent's copy of student's submission

FIELD.NAME: feedback_student_page_id
FIELD.COMMENT: OneNote page id for student's copy of teacher's feedback

FIELD.NAME: submission_teacher_page_id
FIELD.COMMENT: OneNote page id for teacher's copy of student's submission

FIELD.NAME: feedback_teacher_page_id
FIELD.COMMENT: OneNote page id for teacher's copy of teacher's feedback

TABLE.NAME: msa_refresh_tokens
TABLE.COMMENT: to store Microsoft Account refresh tokens for users
